participant_1.background:
I could not be a hockey player if I were blind.
I try to look my best when I go out, but I don't stress out about it too much.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.
i used to wear glasses as a child.
i enjoy comedies.

participant_2.background:
I am comfortable with the weather, and enjoy spending time outdoors.
I lost my dog when I was 10 years old.
i like listening to blues music.
I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group.
I dance for an hour every day to Prince songs.

content.text: Doing okay! I'm a bit chilly, but otherwise I'm good.
Well, I'm glad that you're doing good despite the chill!
Thanks! I'm trying to stay warm by dancing around to Prince songs for an hour each day.
That sounds like a fun way to pass the time!
It is! I also like to go hiking with my family.
Hiking sounds like a great way to get outdoors.
It is! I enjoy spending time in nature, and hiking is a great way to do that.
I used to wear glasses as a child, but I got LASIK surgery when I was 18.
Oh, that must have been a relief! I've never had to wear glasses, but I can imagine how annoying they can be.
It was! I love being able to see clearly without having to wear glasses.
I'm glad that you had a good experience with LASIK surgery.
Thanks! I hope you have a great day!
